title: Al-Fiqh Al-Athra & Attorneys
subtitle: At SQN, we make the law a stronghold of protection and turn justice into a tangible reality. We provide our clients with comprehensive legal services that meet the needs of individuals, companies, and consultants — with an approach that blends expertise and objectivity, precision and professionalism.

service1.title: Corporate Law
service1.description: "We build the entity from its inception, restructure it when needed, and safeguard its rights through every stage."

service2.title: Foreign Investment
service2.description: "We open the doors to the Saudi market with secure investment solutions and sound legal insights."

service3.title: Contracts & Commercial Transactions
service3.description: "Drafting contracts with clarity, and ensuring business dealings with confidence."

service4.title: Compliance & Governance
service4.description: "We align your path with transparency and elevate your standards of integrity and compliance."

service5.title: Sports Law
service5.description: "We protect the legal interests of athletes and clubs—on the field and across e-sports—safeguarding their rights and enhancing their opportunities in a fair, competitive environment."

service6.title: Premium Residency
service6.description: "Residency granted with distinction, supported by seamless legal assistance."

service7.title: Media Cases & Influencer Support
service7.description: "We protect influencers’ rights and strengthen their presence across media and advertising platforms."

service8.title: Criminal Cases
service8.description: "We protect individual rights and ensure justice in criminal cases through defense and legal pursuit."

service9.title: Intellectual Property
service9.description: "We protect your innovation and preserve your ideas so your creations remain secure."

service10.title: Banking & Finance Law
service10.description: "We guide our clients through the world of finance and investment with legal solutions that protect their rights and enhance their ventures."

service11.title: Real Estate Contracts & Transactions
service11.description: "We organize property rights and resolve disputes to ensure trust and stability in real estate."

service12.title: Bankruptcy Services
service12.description: "We stand by the creditor in reclaiming rights and guide the debtor through hardship, in line with bankruptcy laws — upholding justice and preserving assets."

service13.title: Inheritance, Endowments & Wills
service13.description: "We safeguard rightful inheritances and preserve family values with wise legal counsel."

service14.title: Comprehensive Labor Dispute Services
service14.description: "We create balance and preserve rights within workplace environments."

service15.title: Judgment Enforcement & Debt Collection
service15.description: "We secure rights and collect debts through legal solutions that combine firmness with professional courtesy."
